Posts.Content: MMelaniee31 wrote: Hey, My name is Melanie and I am 31 years old a couple of weeks ago I found a lump in my breast..I went to see my doctor the next day and she thought it was a cyst and I should wait a couple of weeks to see if it went away...My husband went with me and he told her he didnt think we should wait and so she went ahead a set up and ultrasound appointment...They scheduled it on my birthday (which sucked) on a Monday so I had to wait out the weekend ....I had the ultrasound and the they said it appeared to be a sebaceous cyst and I shoulnt worry about it cause he wasnt worried I should have it rechecked in 6 months..I was not ok with that I worry about everything but I thought I would try ...the next day my doctor gave me the option to wait or go see a surgeon ..I choose to see the surgeon ...Well he felt it and decided to do an ultrasound in his office...his findings was he thinks its a fibroadenoma and the chance of it being cancer were slim but he couldnt say 100% that it wasnt cancer ..He suggested we take it out so I am going to have the surgery this Monday October 3rd and I am trying t o stay positive but I am freaking out...I keep thinking its cancer and how bad is and am I going to make and I cry and get upset and I try to hide it from my husband and I dont want my kids seeing me upset I dont have anyone who understands what I am going through to talk to...Can he tell when he removes it if it cancer or not or does he have to send it somewhere and how long does that take?
